subject: RE: [junit] JUnit/HTTPUnit w/JavaScript
msgSnippet: ... Hi Dale, for JavaScript you have the choice between two implementations: jsUnit from Edward Hieatt available at http://sf.net/projects/jsunit or JsUnit
messageBody:
Dale wrote:
> I'm looking to test my app and would like to use both of these
> (JUnit / HTTPUnit with JavaScript) Does anyone have any good
> examples of code that I can use. It seems all of the links that
> people give me never really shows me any example code.

Hi Dale,

for JavaScript you have the choice between two implementations:
jsUnit from Edward Hieatt available at http://sf.net/projects/jsunit or
JsUnit from me available at http://www.berlios.de/projects/jsunit

Edward's version is completly browser based and might fit better if you want to test code based on actions in the DOM model, while my version is more strictly a JUnit port concentrating on funcionality. Look to the project's homepages and delivery for examples.

Regards,
Jörg
